sect2.title: Recommended Changes
sect2.para: Here is a list of changes in Results Repository code that could be useful in BEEN's future.

sect3.title: Replace Derby by another DBMS
sect3.para: Because Derby's transaction support is flawed and heavy use of transactions can cause deadlocks and lock timeouts, in order to fully support transactions (if they are really needed) Derby might be replaced by another embeddable Java database that supports MVCC. A candidate could be H2 database (http://www.h2database.com/) that has MVCC, can be embedded and and is written fully in Java. Nevertheless all the consequences of such a change have to be evaluated before changing anything.
